1.q_string: Electrical conductance through metals is called metallic or electronic conductance and is due to the movement of electrons. The electronic conductance depends on:

q_option: Increase in total number of current carrying species.
Weakening of inter ionic attractions and increase in ionic mobilities.
1.q_string: Molar conductance of KCl increases slowly with decrease in concentration because of:

q_option: that limiting molar conductivity of an electrolyte can be represented as the difference of the individual contributions of the anion and cation of the electrolyte
limiting molar conductivity of anion and cation of the electrolyte with respect to nature of ions with which it is associated
at infinite dilution, each ion migrates independently of its co-ion and makes its own contribution
that molar conductivity of an electrolyte can be represented as the sum of the individual contributions of the anion and cation of the electrolyte
